title: LF: B2 to S1 Jungler/Mid for team
body:
We're a group of friends looking to start doing Flex ranked during season 8 and see how far we can get. We're currently 4 ( Supp/ADC/Top/Mid) and we're looking for someone who likes playing jungle and being a team member rather than a lone wolf. 
Our Mid can jungle and would be ok to swap mains if needed, and top and adc know how to jungle as well, but they main the other positions, so the odd swap here and there is also possible but they do main those lanes.

Contact me IG or via here and we can set up for a few games to see the chemistry with the whole fam - 

We play pretty much every night (Sydney time) and some of the guys also play earlier/later cuz they live in perth and qld. We use discord and love to talk sht while playing btw. 

Oh, and should not be homophobe/racist/supertoxic!!!!

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: Wait are you all gay? Since we canâ€™t be homophobic
lololol nope, but a couple are
I am interested :) I added you ingame but one thing I might have an issue with is schedule.
